channel.title: View Page Spammer
channel.description:
My View page spammer
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2zy98cx.jpg[/img]
Is what it looks like, it takes forever, but it works. It uses 'for' so it takes about a minute for 2,000 views. My first real program, so you can flame all you want :P
EDIT: If you actually need proof look at the amount of views on this page or RePlay's topic :P[hr]

item.title: View Page Spammer
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I’ve locked this.

This is a programming section for christ’s sake, not a section for you to post a screenshot of god only knows what and proclaim that you’ve done something of value.

Read full topic

item.title: View Page Spammer
item.dc:creator: @PeeHPee PeeHPee
item.description:
@PeeHPee wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:304717"][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=400918.msg2972603#msg2972603 date=1254058548]

[quote author=`Alec link=topic=400918.msg2972592#msg2972592 date=1254057730]

What’s the point of this? You can just go into the mysql database and change the numbers.
[/quote]People use them on websites they arn’t an admin on. Such as youtube to boost vid views, or voting websites to mass vote etc. I also don’t think mitb would appreciate you using this on his site and im amazed proxyshield didn’t blacklist you.

Mm, I wont do it anymore, I just wanted to test it.

Making a page refresher isn’t exactly pr0 programming.

You have no clue what you are talking about. It doesn’t ‘refresh’, it opens connections multiple times. I’m not releasing it because then every page on moparscape would have 10,000 views.
[/quote]URL url = new URL("http://www.dix.net/dix.html"); url.openStream();

???

If you only wanted to open it once?[/quote]

for(int i = 0; i < 50; i++) {
    URL url = new URL("http://dix.net/dix.html");
    url.openStream();
}

???

Read full topic

item.title: View Page Spammer
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:304717"][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=400918.msg2972603#msg2972603 date=1254058548]

[quote author=`Alec link=topic=400918.msg2972592#msg2972592 date=1254057730]

What’s the point of this? You can just go into the mysql database and change the numbers.
[/quote]People use them on websites they arn’t an admin on. Such as youtube to boost vid views, or voting websites to mass vote etc. I also don’t think mitb would appreciate you using this on his site and im amazed proxyshield didn’t blacklist you.

Mm, I wont do it anymore, I just wanted to test it.

Making a page refresher isn’t exactly pr0 programming.

You have no clue what you are talking about. It doesn’t ‘refresh’, it opens connections multiple times. I’m not releasing it because then every page on moparscape would have 10,000 views.
[/quote]URL url = new URL("http://www.dix.net/dix.html"); url.openStream();

???

If you only wanted to open it once?[/quote]My point being this post is totally useless and gives nothing to the section at all. Any moron can make an application that does this.

Read full topic

item.title: View Page Spammer
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:304722"][quote author=inertia link=topic=400918.msg2972655#msg2972655 date=1254061626]

I’m not releasing it because then every page on moparscape would have 10,000 views.

My point was that this is seriously basic stuff so nobody is going to be impressed with your super awesome unreleased software and start begging you to post a download link.

I know exactly what this program does - it’s a piece of shit that reloads the same page over and over WOW!
[/quote]
Okay, great. Now leave if you just want to flame.[/quote]

Oh right sorry.

Great work ALEC`! please release I pay $10 via paypal UK ltd

Seriously, what can anyone say if we can’t even comment on your code?

Read full topic
